about_the_game:
Welcome to Towers Together's Supporter Pack on Steam!

As a small studio of only three developers, we are extremely grateful for your support. If you enjoyed playing our game, we would be honored if you considered purchasing our Supporter Pack.

As of now, our pack only includes the "Supporter Lobby Cover," but we promise that more exciting additions are on the way! Stay tuned for updates and thank you again for being a part of our journey.
